#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
 using namespace std ;
struct tt{
  int id;
  ll prod ;
}node[100002];

bool compare(const struct tt &a,const struct tt &b){
   if(a.prod==b.prod)
    return a.id>b.id;
    else
        return a.prod<b.prod;

}
int main(){

int t,n,i,j,k;
string ss;
cin>>n>>k;
cin>>ss;

string ans;
int has[26];
for(i=0;i<k;++i){
   memset(has,0,sizeof(has));
   for(j=i;j<ss.length();j+=k)
        has[(int)ss[j]-97]++;

   char an ;
   int maxm = 0;
   for(j=0;j<26;++j){
      if(has[j]>maxm){
        maxm = has[j];
        an = j;
      }
   }
   ans.pb((char)(an+97));
}
cout<<ans<<endl;
return 0;
}
